1.label: Voltage to calculate power
1.description: Line voltage used for device calculations of wattage

4.label: Report threshold
4.description:
Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4.11 below.
	  This is used to reduce network traffic.

5.label: Whole Smart Strip Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
5.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Whole Smart Strip).

6.label: Socket 1 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
6.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 1).

7.label: Socket 2 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
7.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 2).

8.label: Socket 3 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
8.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 3).

9.label: Socket 4 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
9.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 4).

10.label: Socket 5 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
10.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 5).

11.label: Socket 6 Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
11.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 6).

12.label: Whole Smart Strip Minimum Change to send Report (%)
12.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Whole Smart Strip).

13.label: Socket 1 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
13.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 1).

14.label: Socket 2 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
14.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 2).

15.label: Socket 3 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
15.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 3).

16.label: Socket 4 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
16.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 4).

17.label: Socket 5 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
17.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 5).

18.label: Socket 6 Minimum Change to send Report (%)
18.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce an automatic report (Socket 6).

80.label: Notification status
80.description: Defines the automated status notification of an associated device when status changes

100.label: Default Group Reports
100.description: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

101.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
101.description:
Configure auto report which information as Group 1.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

102.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
102.description:
Configure auto report which information as Group 2.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

103.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
103.description:
Configure auto report which information as Group 3.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power level with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power level with specified time interval
	Value 4 (lsb) 
			bit 7 reserved
			bit 6 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 6)
			bit 5 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 5)
			bit 4 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 4)
			bit 3 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 3)
			bit 2 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 2)
			bit 1 Auto report power consumption with specified time interval (channel 1)
			bit 0 Auto report the total power consumption with specified time interval

110.label: Set 111-113 to default
110.description: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

111.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
111.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

112.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
112.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

113.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
113.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.

101[0xff].label: select channels to report consumtion as item 1
101[0xff].description: A binary field for reporting consumption (kWh) of channels

101[0xff00].label: Select channels to report power as item 1
101[0xff00].description: A binary field to choose channels to report power
